description: Numbers that are the sum of 2 nonzero squares in 7 or more ways.
links: Index entries for sequences related to sums of squares
mathematica: Parallelize[Select[Range[120000],Length[PowersRepresentations[#,2,2]]>6&]]  (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Feb 19 2011 *)nn = 112625; t = Table[0, {nn}]; lim = Floor[Sqrt[nn - 1]]; Do[num = i^2 + j^2; If[num <= nn, t[[num]]++], {i, lim}, {j, i}]; Flatten[Position[t, _?(# >= 7 &)]] (* _T. D. Noe_, Apr 07 2011 *)
author: _David W. Wilson_
